mapper.select: select USER_ID as userId, USER_NAME as userName, ID_CARD as idCard, AGE as age, GENDER as gender, DEPT as dept, USER_ADDRESS as address, USER_CELLPHONE_NO as phone, REGIST_TIME as registTime from V_ODS_USER_CENTER_INFO where 1=1 and AGE >= #{ageStart} and AGE <= #{ageEnd} and GENDER = #{gender} and REGIST_TIME >= #{startTime} order by REGIST_TIME
SELECT GENDER as name,count(*) as value FROM V_ODS_USER_CENTER_INFO GROUP BY GENDER
